subject: Re: Phonak cleaning items to be updated
preview: This will be actioned in ticket - https://secure.helpscout.net/conversation/2961712325

full_threads.body: This will be actioned in ticket - https://secure.helpscout.net/conversation/2961712325

Hi Rica, Can you please add the updated cleansing portfolio brochure into the Consumer section, it will require a new image on the front of the tile as the image on the front of the brochure has been updated. Can we please update the Accessories, batteries and cleaning page with the below edits: Chargers and Batteries
  • Delete powerone batteries
  • Update side panel and grey tabs to:
  • 2. Chargers (delete and Batteries)
  • 4. Professional brochures
  • 5. Consumer brochures
Cleaning
  • Please update the BTE starter kit tile image and the PDF to download to the updated version attached.
  • Please add in Datasheet ITE Maintenance Kit next to the BTE starter kit. See attached PDF.
Thanks, Mel.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed
Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Cameron,

Apologies for the oversight.

I've now ensured that the Cleansing portfolio is no longer appearing in the Consumer section.
Please don’t hesitate to reach out if you'd like any further updates.

Quick note: If you have a new concern or an additional task related to a previous ticket, please send it through in a new email. This helps us keep things clear and respond more efficiently.

Hi Rica,

It is still showing on my end. Can you please remove.

Accessories, Batteries and Cleaning Kits - Phonak Marketing Catalogue

Regards,

Melinda

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Thanks for that,

Regards,

Melinda

Hi Cameron,

Sure, I made the changes for you.

Note: If you have a new concern or an additional task related to a previous ticket, please send it to us in a new email. This helps us avoid confusion and ensures a faster, more focused response.

Hi Rica,

Can you please remove the Cleansing portfolio from the consumer section for now, it has just been brought to my attention that it contains an image of an item we are not stocking for sale in Australia.



I will send updated artwork once I have this.

Regards,

Melinda

full_threads.body:
Hi support,

Will we be able to have these updates made by the end of today?

I am wanting to link this page with an eDM we are sending tomorrow.

Regards,

Melinda

Hi Rica,

Can you please restructure the items to sit under the following categories (and list in the side panel)


  1. Accessories
  2. Chargers and Batteries
  3. Cleaning
  4. Brochures
  5. Consumer


Can you please move the ChargerGo datasheets into the Chargers and Batteries section (at the end)

Remove the label datasheets on the side panel.

Remove all the datasheets and cleansing brochures sitting under the Accessories section.

M.
